text: Inn logon ko aur kissi baat ka intizar nahi sirf iss kay akheet nateejay ka intizar hai jiss roz iss ka akheet nateeja paish aaye ga aur uss roz jo log iss ko pehlay say bhoolay huye thay yun kahen gay kay waqaee humaray rab kay payghumbar sachi sachi baaten laye thay so abb kiya koi humara sifarshi hai kay woh humari sifarish ker dey ya kiya hum phir wapis bhejay jaa saktay hain takay hum log unn aemaal kay jo hum kiya kertay thay bar khilaf doosray aemaal keren. Be-shak inn logon ney apney aap ko khasaray mein daal diya aur yeh jo jo baaten tarashtay thay sab gum hogaeen
